TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed RemotingServices extends System.Object
public ref class RemotingServices abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects and proxies.

span.span: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects and proxies.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非您是服务提供程序处理激活、 生存期管理或事务等的问题，您不需要区分代理引用和对象引用。Unless you are a service provider dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, or transactions, you do not need to distinguish between proxy references and object references. 远程处理基础结构使用意味着远程对象驻留在客户端的空间的透明代理。The remoting infrastructure uses transparent proxies that give the impression that the remote objects reside in the client's space. 代理转发到远程位置的实际对象对其进行的调用来实现此目的。Proxies achieve this by forwarding calls made on them to the real objects at remote locations.

summary.span: Creates a proxy for a well-known object.

span.span: Creates a proxy for a well-known object.

summary.span: Creates a proxy for a well-known object, given the and URL.

span.span: A proxy to the remote object that points to an endpoint served by the specified well-known object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的代理对象指向由指定的已知对象提供服务的终结点。The returned proxy object points to an endpoint served by the specified well-known object. 在代理上调用方法之前，是通过网络不发送任何消息。No messages are sent over the network until a method is called on the proxy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法创建的已知对象的代理。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a proxy to a well-known object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.TimerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.TimerSample/CPP/timerclient.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.TimerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.TimerSample/CS/timerclient.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.TimerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.TimerSample/VB/timerclient.vb#1)] 若要编译并运行此示例中，将需要进行编译和运行服务器、 timerserver.exe 和编译是共享库，timerservice.dll。To compile and run this example, you will need to compile and run a server, timerserver.exe, and compile a shared library, timerservice.dll. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是用于跨应用程序域边界传输的对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析，以创建通常连接到真实的对象的对象的代理。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 在取消过程分析提取方法信息的远程对象和透明代理和创建对象。During unmarshaling, the is parsed to extract the method information of the remote object and both the transparent proxy and objects are created. 一个包含描述信息被封送处理的对象类，URI 用于唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何访问远程应用程序的信息和位置对象所在。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remote application where the object is located. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取指定的对象的实例。The following code example demonstrates how to get a instance for the specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/CPP/client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/CS/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/VB/client.vb#1)]

param.span: A transparent proxy.

span.span: Returns the real proxy backing the specified transparent proxy.

returns.span: The real proxy instance backing the transparent proxy.

span.span: The real proxy instance backing the transparent proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用一个对象，可跨任何类型的远程处理边界的客户端实际上通过的对象的透明代理。A client that uses an object across any kind of remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明代理让人觉得实际对象驻留在客户端的空间。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 通过将转发到使用远程处理基础结构的实际对象对其所做的调用来实现这。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 由类型的托管运行时类的实例提供支持的透明代理。The transparent proxy is backed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 实现从透明代理转发操作所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 代理对象继承的托管对象，如垃圾回收相关联的语义和支持成员和方法，可以扩展到新窗体的类。A proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for members and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 代理可作为远程对象 （透明代理），与相同的类的对象，也是一个托管的对象。The proxy acts as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and is also a managed object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 远程处理标识在终结点使用 Uri，因为方法是在使用远程处理基础结构 （例如，信道接收器、 动态接收器和上下文接收器） 的可插入部分中非常有用对象，因为当前方法从 URI 将返回关联的类型对象。Because remoting identifies endpoints using URIs, the method is very useful in the pluggable parts of the remoting infrastructure (for example, channel sinks, dynamic sinks, and context sinks) that use objects, because the current method will return the associated type object from the URI. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CPP/remotingservicessample.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CS/remotingservicessample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/VB/remotingservicessample.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能在同一应用程序中使用对象返回相同的会话 ID，但此方法将永远不会返回不同的远程应用程序中的两个对象相同的会话 ID。The same session ID might be returned for objects in the same application, but this method will never return the same session ID for two objects in different remote applications. 有关会话和会话 Id 标识的详细信息，请参阅 ASP.Net [ASP.NET 会话状态概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For more information about identifying sessions and session IDs, see ASP.Net [ASP.NET Session State Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取当前会话的会话 ID 字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to get the session ID string for the current session. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.ExecuteMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.ExecuteMessage/CPP/serviceclass.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.ExecuteMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.ExecuteMessage/CS/serviceclass.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.ExecuteMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.ExecuteMessage/VB/serviceclass.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文是定义一个环境，用于驻留在其中的对象的属性有序的序列。A context is an ordered sequence of properties that define an environment for the objects that reside inside it. 配置为要求某些自动服务，此类同步、 事务、 在实时激活、 安全性和等等的对象在激活过程会创建上下文。Contexts are created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services such synchronization, transactions, just-in-time activation, security, and so on. 多个对象可以存留在一个上下文内。Multiple objects can live inside a context. ## Examples [!code-cpp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/VB/class1.vb#1)]

param.span: The method in question.

span.span: The method in question.

summary.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the client that called the method specified in the given message is waiting for the server to finish processing the method before continuing execution.

span.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the client that called the method specified in the given message is waiting for the server to finish processing the method before continuing execution.

returns.span: if the method is one way; otherwise, .

span.span: if the method is one way; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用一个单向方法时，客户端不等待服务器完成处理该消息。When a one-way method is called, the client does not wait for the server to finish processing the message. 客户端方法返回的服务器将成功处理该消息不需要知道应用程序。The client method returns to the application with no knowledge of whether or not the server will successfully process the message. 方法被标记为一种方法使用。Methods are marked as one way using the . 单向方法不能有返回值或任何输出参数。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any out parameters. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CPP/remotingservicessample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CS/remotingservicessample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/VB/remotingservicessample.vb#2)]

Public Shared Function IsTransparentProxy (proxy As Object) As Boolean

static member IsTransparentProxy : obj -> bool

param.name: proxy
param.span: The reference to the object to check.

span.span: The reference to the object to check.

summary.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the given object is a transparent proxy or a real object.

span.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the given object is a transparent proxy or a real object.

returns.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object specified in the parameter is a transparent proxy or a real object.

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object specified in the parameter is a transparent proxy or a real object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用一个对象，可跨任何类型的远程处理边界的客户端实际上通过的对象的透明代理。A client that uses an object across any kind of a remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明代理让人觉得实际对象驻留在客户端的空间。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 通过将转发到使用远程处理基础结构的实际对象对其所做的调用来实现这。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明代理是由类型的托管运行时类的实例本身。The transparent proxy is itself housed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 实现从透明代理转发操作所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 代理对象继承的托管对象，如垃圾回收相关联的语义和支持成员和方法，可以扩展到新窗体的类。A proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for members and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 因此，代理具有双重特性;一方面它需要使其作为与远程对象 （透明代理），相同的类的对象，并且在另一个托管的对象本身。Thus the proxy has a dual nature; on the one hand it needs to act as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and on the other it is a managed object itself. 可以使用代理对象中不考虑。A proxy object can be used without regard to any remoting subdivisions within a . 应用程序不需要区分代理引用和对象引用。Applications need not distinguish between proxy references and object references. 但是，服务提供商处理问题，如激活，生存期管理和事务需要进行这种区分。However, service providers dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, and transactions need to make such distinctions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法来确定对象是否为代理还是实际对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to determine whether an object is a proxy or a real object. 有关完整示例代码中，请参阅示例类。For the complete example code, see the example for the class. [!code-cpp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CPP/ad.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CS/ad.cs#6)] [!code-vb[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/VB/ad.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef Marshal (MarshalByRefObject Obj);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef Marshal(class System.MarshalByRefObject Obj) cil managed
Public Shared Function Marshal (Obj As MarshalByRefObject) As ObjRef
public: static System::Runtime::Remoting::ObjRef ^ Marshal(MarshalByRefObject ^ Obj);
static member Marshal : MarshalByRefObject -> System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef

param.name: Obj
param.span: The object to convert.

span.span: The object to convert.

summary.span: Takes a , registers it with the remoting infrastructure, and converts it into an instance of the class.

span.span: Takes a , registers it with the remoting infrastructure, and converts it into an instance of the class.

returns.span: An instance of the class that represents the object specified in the parameter.

span.span: An instance of the class that represents the object specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是用于跨应用程序域边界传输的对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析，以创建通常连接到真实的对象的对象的代理。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 一个包含描述信息和正在封送的对象类，URI 用于唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达远程处理分支信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 在封送处理，使用从当前线程的上下文，不是用上下文的处于活动状态时创建对象时。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 如果 URI 不显式设置了方法，由远程处理标识基础结构自动生成。If a URI was not explicitly set by the method, it is automatically generated by the remoting identity infrastructure. 无法将 URI 与代理关联的两个原因之一： 在它表示的对象在服务器端生成 URI 或该对象是很知名，这种情况下知晓 URI。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 出于此原因，如果`Obj`参数是一个代理，将引发异常。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 对于自定义代理可以因为透明代理被视为该服务器对象放宽此限制。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object.

exception.span: The parameter is an object proxy.

span.span: The parameter is an object proxy.

exception.span: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.

span.span: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是用于跨应用程序域边界传输的对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析，以创建通常连接到真实的对象的对象的代理。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 一个包含描述信息和正在封送的对象类，URI 用于唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达远程处理分支信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 在封送处理，使用从当前线程的上下文，不是用上下文的处于活动状态时创建对象时。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 无法将 URI 与代理关联的两个原因之一： 在它表示的对象在服务器端生成 URI 或该对象是很知名，这种情况下知晓 URI。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 出于此原因，如果`Obj`参数是一个代理，将引发异常。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 对于自定义代理可以因为透明代理被视为该服务器对象放宽此限制。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用当前方法进行封送处理指定的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the current method to marshal a specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/CPP/manualserver.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/CS/manualserver.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/VB/manualserver.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是用于跨应用程序域边界传输的对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析，以创建通常连接到真实的对象的对象的代理。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 一个包含描述信息和正在封送的对象类，URI 用于唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达远程处理分支信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 指定远程处理基础结构用于公开的类型层次结构的作用域限制。The specified is used by the remoting infrastructure to limit the scope of the exposed type hierarchy. 例如，如果对象 A 派生对象派生自 object C，B 和调用，则客户端可以强制转换代理 C 和 B 之间，但不是到 a。For example, if object A derives from object B, which derives from object C, and is called, then the client can cast the proxy between C and B but not to A. 在封送处理，使用从当前线程的上下文，不是用上下文的处于活动状态时创建对象时。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 无法将 URI 与代理关联的两个原因之一： 在它表示的对象在服务器端生成 URI 或该对象是很知名，这种情况下知晓 URI。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 出于此原因，如果`Obj`参数是一个代理，将引发异常。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 对于自定义代理可以因为透明代理被视为该服务器对象放宽此限制。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object.

summary.span: Sets the URI for the subsequent call to the method.

span.span: Sets the URI for the subsequent call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置当前方法的 URI 用于封送处理给定的对象。The URI set by the current method is used when marshaling the given object. 封送后，将指定对象的 URI 设置为中的字符串`uri`参数追加到的当前。After marshaling, the URI of the specified object is set to the string in the `uri` parameter appended onto the of the current . 如果当前应用程序正在侦听的 HTTP 端口，则这两个字符串中指定`uri`参数和`uri`字符串附加到的当前路由到指定的对象。If the current application is listening on an HTTP port, then both the string specified in the `uri` parameter and the `uri` string appended onto the of the current route to the specified object. 示例中，如果应用程序正在侦听 HTTP 端口 9000，则两者`http://localhost:9000/objectUri`，并`http://localhost:9000//objectUri`路由中指定的对象到`obj`参数。For example, if the application is listening on HTTP port 9000, then both `http://localhost:9000/objectUri`, and `http://localhost:9000//objectUri` route to the object specified in the `obj` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置将由 URI方法时进行封送处理指定的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the URI that will be used by the method when marshaling the specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是用于跨应用程序域边界传输的对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析，以创建通常连接到真实的对象的对象的代理。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 在取消过程分析提取方法信息的远程对象和透明代理和创建对象。During unmarshaling, the is parsed to extract the method information of the remote object and both the transparent proxy and objects are created. 已分析的内容之前向公共语言运行时注册的透明代理添加到透明代理。The content of the parsed is added to the transparent proxy before the transparent proxy is registered with the common language runtime. 一个包含描述信息和正在封送的对象类，URI 用于唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达远程处理分支信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何取消封送对象。The following code example demonstrates how to unmarshal an object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.Unmarshal#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.Unmarshal/CPP/client.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.Unmarshal#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.Unmarshal/CS/client.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.Unmarshal#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.Unmarshal/VB/client.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是用于跨应用程序域边界传输的对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析，以创建通常连接到真实的对象的对象的代理。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 在取消过程分析提取方法信息的远程对象和透明代理和创建对象。During unmarshaling, the is parsed to extract the method information of the remote object and both the transparent proxy and objects are created. 已分析的内容之前向公共语言运行时注册的透明代理添加到透明代理。The content of the parsed is added to the transparent proxy before the transparent proxy is registered with the common language runtime. 一个包含描述信息和正在封送的对象类，URI 用于唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达远程处理分支信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 首次创建，该代理时，类型的。When first created, the proxy is of type . 将其转换为不同类型，如远程处理基础结构跟踪的最常用的类型，以避免不必要地加载该类型。As you cast it into different types, the remoting infrastructure keeps track of the most used type to avoid loading the type unnecessarily.
